name: Snake-tronic
description:
My second ever game as an entry for my first ever jam! the Go Godot Jam 3 (theme: evolution).

Eat rabbits, turtles and frogs to gain their abilities on the next run of the game.

Controls:

  • A, D = Steer the snake.
  • W = Dash ability (when unlocked)
  • S = Slow ability (when unlocked)
  • Space = Jump ability (when unlocked)

Abilities:

  • Eat 10 rabbits, turtles or frogs in a single life to unlock their ability and evolve on the next run.
  • [Rabbit] Dash ability increases your speed 2x for 1 second.
  • [Turtle] Slow ability decreases your speed by 0.5x for 1 second.
  • [Frog] Jump ability increases your speed by 1.5x for 0.5 seconds and disables collisions with your own body so you can "jump" over yourself.

The game is left in a prototype stage, as I didn't manage my time and couldn't implement all the features I wanted, along with essentials like sprites and SFX. I'll come back to this as I really enjoyed this project and there's much I still want to add. Also, the game name is a meme.

Known issues:

  • When spamming A and D to curve the snake, the head will detach from the body slowly. This is due to how the curve is calculated.

Credits:

  • Font: Monogram by datagoblin.
  • Sprites: Controller & Keyboard Icons by vryell. Only used few keyboard sprites.

If you happen to play this game on stream, let me know so I can re-watch it:)
